text: (a) the plane through (1,2,1) perpendicular to the vector (1,2,3). (b) the plane through (1,2,1) parallel to the vectors (0,1, —3) and (—2,0,7). (c) the surface S : 2% + 3y + 22 + 4 = 0. (d) the part of the sphere % +y* + 22 = 16, > 2 (use y, z as parameters). (e) the part of the sphere % + y* + 22 = 16, z > —2 (use spherical coordinates).
